ai-pli-tv-pvr1.14:1.1_0: if he has sexual intercourse with the four legal issues, what is a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.14:1.2_0: he had sexual intercourse with the four legal issues. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.14:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, that is to say, a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.14:2.2_0: Because of disrespect, a legal issue arising from water, a defect, or spit in the water, that is a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.14:3.1_0: The sixth section for recitation on legal issues is finished.
